Package net.threescale.api.v2

This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Api2 Version 2 of the 3Scale API.
ApiResponse  
HttpConnectionFactory Interface to obtain an HttpURLConnection.
HttpSender Interface used to send Http Requests to the server.
 

Class Summary
Api2Impl Concrete implementation of the Version 2 API.
ApiFilter Example Servlet Filter Class for Api access.
ApiHttpResponse Response returned for Http Request.
ApiTransaction Data to be sent for the server for a transaction
ApiUsageMetric DTO for metric data.
ApiUtil Common utility methods.
AuthorizeResponse Response from server containing current statistics.
Dates Utilty class for data formatting.
HttpSenderImpl Concrete implementation of HttpSender
 

Exception Summary
ApiException Encapsulate Api Exceptions
 

Package net.threescale.api.v2 Description

This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend. It is used to encapsulate the communication with the 3scale backend server for validating and reporting transactions between the user and the provider of a service.

The version 2 api include caching of authorize operations and batching of responses sent to the server.

For the definitive specification of the interface refer to The 3scale Management API specification

Example code

In the package net.threescale.api.v2 there is an example of how to call the api.

Jar file

The runtime Api for both version 1 and 2 is in the distribution tarball in dist/threescale-api.jar.
